mapper.insert: insert into applylab (apply_content, lab_id, user_id, apply_state, apply_time, use_time) values(#{apply_content}, #{lab_id}, #{user_id}, #{apply_state}, #{apply_time}, #{use_time})
insert into applydevice (apply_content, device_id, user_id, apply_state, apply_time) values(#{apply_content}, #{device_id}, #{user_id}, #{apply_state}, #{apply_time})
mapper.select: select * from applylab where apply_id like "%"#{apply_id}"%" and apply_state != "通过"
mapper.update: update applylab set apply_state = "通过", deal_man = #{deal_man} where apply_id = #{apply_id}
update applylab set apply_state = "申请不通过", deal_man = #{deal_man} where apply_id = #{apply_id}
mapper.select: select * from applydevice where apply_id like "%"#{apply_id}"%" and apply_state != "通过"
mapper.update: update applydevice set apply_state = "通过", deal_man = #{deal_man} where apply_id = #{apply_id}
update applydevice set apply_state = "申请不通过", deal_man = #{deal_man} where apply_id = #{apply_id}
